#summary PayPal Payment Methods.

<table>
  <thead>
    <tr>
      <th colspan="2"></th>
      <th>Order created</th>
      <th>Payment successful</th>
      <th>Payment Canceled</th>
      <th>After shipment</th>
    </tr>
  </thead>
  <tbody>
    <tr>
      <td rowspan="2">*Express Checkout*</td>
      <td>_Simple_</td>
      <td colspan="2">Processing</td>
      <td>No order</td>
      <td>Complete</td>
    </tr>
    <tr>
      <td>_Virtual_</td>
      <td colspan="2">Complete</td>
      <td>No order</td>
      <td>---</td>
    </tr>

    <tr>
      <td rowspan="2">*Standard Checkout*</td>
      <td>_Simple_</td>
      <td>Pending Payment</td>
      <td>Processing</td>
      <td>Cancelled</td>
      <td>Pending Payment</td>
    </tr>
    <tr>
      <td>_Virtual_</td>
      <td>Pending Payment</td>
      <td>Complete</td>
      <td>Cancelled</td>
      <td>---</td>
    </tr>
  </tbody>
<table>
